Package core

Class RestaurantManager

  • Object
    • RestaurantManager
  • public abstract class RestaurantManager
extends Object
    Blueprint class for every restaurant data object manager. Managers must extend this class to make use of the Restaurant instance to store and manipulate data.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private InputHelper in
      Holds the inputHelper instance for the current application session.
      private Restaurant restaurant
      Holds the restaurant instance for the current application session.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RestaurantManager​(Restaurant restaurant)
      Creates a new manager instance, taking in a restaurant instance created for the application session.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected InputHelper getInputHelper()
      Returns the input helper object stored initialised in the base class
      abstract String[] getMainCLIOptions()
      Returns an array of menu option strings to be displayed by the application for users to select from.
      abstract Runnable[] getOptionRunnables()
      Returns an array of runnable / methods.
      protected Restaurant getRestaurant()
      Returns the restaurant object stored in the base class
      void init()
      Initialisation method for the manager - only runs at application start-up.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • restaurant

        private Restaurant restaurant
        Holds the restaurant instance for the current application session.

      • in

        private InputHelper in
        Holds the inputHelper instance for the current application session.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RestaurantManager

        public RestaurantManager​(Restaurant restaurant)
        Creates a new manager instance, taking in a restaurant instance created for the application session. Initialises an inputHelper object to assist in input collection through the CLI.
        Parameters:
        restaurant - a initialised restaurant instance

    • Method Detail

      • getRestaurant

        protected Restaurant getRestaurant()
        Returns the restaurant object stored in the base class
        Returns:
        restaurant object

      • getInputHelper

        protected InputHelper getInputHelper()
        Returns the input helper object stored initialised in the base class
        Returns:
        inputHelper object

      • init

        public void init()
          throws Exception
        Initialisation method for the manager - only runs at application start-up. Not compulsory for classes that extend RestaurantManager to implement this.
        Throws:
        Exception - errors that occurred while initialising the manager

      • getMainCLIOptions

        public abstract String[] getMainCLIOptions()
        Returns an array of menu option strings to be displayed by the application for users to select from. Acts as the text-version of the entry points into the managers.
        Returns:
        self-defined array of menu option strings

      • getOptionRunnables

        public abstract Runnable[] getOptionRunnables()
        Returns an array of runnable / methods. These are the entry points into the managers from the main function.
        Returns:
        self-defined array of runnables / methods
